metadata.title: CVE-2022-48740 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:selinux: fix double free of cond_list on error pathsOn error path from cond_read_list() and duplicate_policydb_cond_list()the cond_list_destroy() gets called a second time in caller functions,resulting in NULL pointer deref.  Fix this by resetting thecond_list_len to 0 in cond_list_destroy(), making subsequent calls anoop.Also consistently reset the cond_list pointer to NULL after freeing.[PM: fix line lengths in the description]

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
